description: This file contains unit tests for the URLReader class in the agno.document.reader module, testing both synchronous and asynchronous URL reading functionalities, including error handling and chunking features.

methods.name: mock_response
methods.description: Fixture that creates a mocked HTTP response object for testing.

methods.name: test_read_url_success
methods.description: Tests successful URL reading with a mock response.

methods.name: test_read_url_with_path
methods.description: Tests URL reading with a path component in the URL.

methods.name: test_read_empty_url
methods.description: Tests behavior when reading an empty URL, expecting a ValueError.

methods.name: test_read_url_with_proxy
methods.description: Tests URL reading with a specified proxy.

methods.name: test_read_url_request_error
methods.description: Tests handling of a RequestError during URL fetch.

methods.name: test_read_url_http_error
methods.description: Tests handling of an HTTPStatusError during URL fetch.

methods.name: test_chunking
methods.description: Tests the chunking functionality of the URLReader.

methods.name: test_async_read_empty_url
methods.description: Tests async reading with an empty URL, expecting a ValueError.

methods.name: test_async_read_url_with_proxy
methods.description: Tests async URL reading with a proxy.

methods.name: test_async_read_url_request_error
methods.description: Tests handling of a RequestError during async URL fetch.

methods.name: test_async_read_url_http_error
methods.description: Tests handling of an HTTPStatusError during async URL fetch.

methods.name: test_async_chunking
methods.description: Tests the async chunking functionality of the URLReader.
